SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server

Class GamesManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.GamesManager
public class GamesManager extends Object
Class that manage all games and connections. The main purpose of the class is to execute messages from clients on the correct Game Controller. The class is a Singleton, so it gets instantiated only one time
